body.para: #12152: focus problems for readonly/disabled form widgets ----------------------+----------------------------------------------------- Reporter: doughays | Owner: doughays Type: defect | Status: closed Priority: normal | Milestone: 1.6 Component: Dijit | Version: 1.5 Severity: normal | Resolution: fixed Keywords: | ----------------------+----------------------------------------------------- Changes (by doughays):
(In [23530]) Fixes #12152. Check for disabled before focusing widget. Also tweak isFocusable to return true for readOnly. Add automated tests.
